cantatikalaiyum, atu, matu, ottakankalaiyum (kotuttu) avane unkalukku utavi ceytirukkiran

atarkavarkal kurinarkal: ‘‘ (Hute!) Ninkal enkalukku nallupatecam ceyvatum nallupatecam ceyyatiruppatum camame
